meanings.definition: A small, sweet variety of mandarin orange.
meanings.sent1: I love snacking on a juicy clementine in the afternoon.
meanings.sent2: She packed a clementine in her lunch for a healthy snack.
meanings.sent3: The clementine rolled off the table and surprised the cat.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter was as bright and refreshing as a clementine on a hot day.
meanings.sent5: The clementine's vibrant color and sweet aroma filled the room.

meanings.sent1: The clementine judge decided to give a lighter sentence.
meanings.sent2: He had a clementine heart, always forgiving others easily.
meanings.sent3: The clementine teacher allowed the students extra time to finish their work.
meanings.sent4: Her clementine nature made her a beloved leader among her friends.
meanings.sent5: The clementine clouds parted, allowing the sun to shine through.
